title: New: Groves – Paperback (Demo)
body: London quintet **Groves** first impressed with a [trio of tracks](www.crackintheroad.com/music/23380-introducing-groves/) back in July of this year, and have now transferred one of the demos over to their Soundcloud page, where it’s sure to reach a wider audience. Paperback, is somewhere between the accessible, yet slightly off-kilter indie pop of **Alt-J**, and more languid, harmony led artists, such as Washed Out or even Youth Lagoon.
